pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Meroxa-py## InstallingInstall and update using [pip](https://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/getting-started/):``` $ pip install -U meroxa-py```## A Simple Example```pythonimport asynciofrom meroxa import Meroxafrom pprint import pprintauth="auth.token",async def main(): async with Meroxa(auth=auth) as m: resp = await m.users.me() pprint(resp)asyncio.run(main())```To obtain a Meroxa Auth Token please see: [How to Obtain a Meroxa Access Token](https://docs.meroxa.com/guides/how-to-obtain-meroxa-access-token/)
